function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in assessing polio through sewage samples","category":"Structures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variability in efficiency of dna/rna extraction from pcr inhibitor rich samples","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the suitability of dpcr for certain sample types","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High mutation rates of rna viruses may lead to rapid adaptation and spread in new host populations.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical data from wastewater surveillance may not accurately predict future disease outbreaks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sewage system containing complex microbial communities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of water fingerprinting for community-wide infectious disease diagnostics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wide array of endogenous chemical and biological urinary biomarkers linked with disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of wastewater-based epidemiology wbe techniques for biomarker selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulties in estimating population size of individual wwtp catchments","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of wastewater composition on hydrochemical parameters","category":"Structures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertainties associated with sample collection and analytical variability","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases through wastewater and surface water","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International collaboration leading to global propagation of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to endogenous biomarkers may reveal information about community health status and disease prevalence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases through untreated-wastewater","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of water sources with harmful chemicals or biological compounds.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate interpretation of biomarkers in wastewater, leading to misrepresentation of community health and lifestyle habits.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance of multiple diseases, including rare ones, in built environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient environmental monitoring of potential hazards in built environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive data collection on the emergence and re-emergence of diseases, and threat of drug-resistant pathogens","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Laboratory facilities becoming overwhelmed during epidemics","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant time-lag between data collection and analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in disease monitoring techniques and resources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Bias, resource insensitivity, and high costs in existing surveillance methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising cases of fungal and viral resistances posing significant threats","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in current infection disease surveillance techniques","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging infectious diseases caused by novel pathogenic organisms","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drivers affecting the emergence and reemergence of infectious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inappropriate usage of antimicrobials leading to drug-resistant pathogens","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of specified","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unemployment generated by the onus of keeping people at home","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective social isolation policies leading to a higher number of infections and deaths","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False dichotomy between healthcare and the
